Claim: "A black dog splashes in the water."
Referring expressions: Black dog, water  A dog, water
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsInWater(a) and IsBlack(b))) & (forall e (forall d (  IsBlack(d) ->   IsADog(e)))) & (forall f (forall g (  IsADog(f) ->   IsBlack(g))))) -> (exists c (exists a (IsInWater(a) and IsADog(c))))
